name: Tactics (crafty_one)
description:
Tactics is a super fun two player game. Each player has a timer after that you are given three options. Drop a bomb and take out an Enemy tank. Call for Reinforcements. Or fly in some fresh supplies to the tanks in the Field. 

Meanwhile the tanks on the battlefield only have so much fuel, shells (yellow status bar), and health (green status bar). If they run low on supplies or health they will go back to their base for new supplies and repairs.

Space Bar will pause the game and give you some options for sound volume, restarting the game, or exiting the game.

Tactics is really simple, but it is FUN to play. 

All art and sound was created just for this game!! 

Don't forget to leave Feedback in the Comments!!!
